In a world once embraced by the vast blue expanse of the ocean, the waves whispered secrets of the deep. But one fateful day, the ocean began to recede, revealing the skeletal remains of forgotten ships and treasures lost to time. The people, once thriving on its bounty, watched in horror as their livelihoods vanished. A young girl named Mira ventured into the barren seabed, discovering a glowing pearl that pulsed with the ocean's last heartbeat. With it, she learned to communicate with the spirits of the sea, vowing to restore the ocean's life. Her journey sparked a revolution, igniting hope to reclaim the waters that nourished their souls.
